TITLE: Welcome to Web GO
DESCRIPTION: Web GO follows the best practices outlined in Web Fundamentals.

FRONTEND.TITLE: Frontend Starter Kit
FRONTEND.CONTENT: A boilerplate for HTML5, Material, Firebase, Gulp, Rollup, Babel, PostHTML, and PostCSS.

BACKEND.TITLE: Backend Starter Kit
BACKEND.CONTENT: A boilerplate for Node.js, Express, Mongoose, Heroku, mLab, Nodemon, PM2, and Babel.
